channel.title: CVE Feed for LenelS2 -- NetBox
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LenelS2 -- NetBox

item.title: CVE-2024-2421|2024-05-30T17:24:33.231Z -- LenelS2 -- NetBox
item.description: LenelS2 NetBox access control and event monitoring system was discovered to contain an unauthenticated RCE in versions prior to and including 5.6.1, which allows an attacker to execute malicious commands with elevated permissions.

item.title: CVE-2024-2422|2024-05-30T17:26:12.543Z -- LenelS2 -- NetBox
item.description: LenelS2 NetBox access control and event monitoring system was discovered to contain an authenticated RCE in versions prior to and including 5.6.1, which allows an attacker to execute malicious commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-2420|2024-05-30T17:22:06.344Z -- LenelS2 -- NetBox
item.description: LenelS2 NetBox access control and event monitoring system was discovered to containÂ Hardcoded Credentials in versions prior to and including 5.6.1 which allows an attacker to bypass authentication requirements.
